oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Sunday Down South - 1954-03-28 - Part 1
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: WSM program Sunday Down South, sponsored by Lion Oil. Originally broadcast 1954-03-28, part 1. Personnel include Buddy Hall (host, performer), David Cobb (announcer), Owen Bradley (conductor) and the Lion Orchestra (performer), the Anita Kerr Singers (performers), Dolores Watson (performer), and Helen Traubel (performer). Hosted at the Ryman Auditorium.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Buddy Hall; Anita Kerr Singers; Owen Bradley; Lion Orchestra; Helen Traubel; Dolores Watson
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Opening statement (David Cobb) -- Theme (Got The South In My Soul) (Buddy Hall) -- Opening statement (Buddy Hall) -- Hillbilly Fever (Buddy Hall, Anita Kerr Singers) -- Buddy Hall introduces Helen Traubel -- Buddy Hall, Helen Traubel and David Cobb talk -- No Other Love (Helen Traubel) -- Lion Oil commercial -- Lion Oil jingle (Dolores Watson) -- Buddy Hall introduces Dolores Watson -- Half As Much (Dolores Watson)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: WSM (Radio station : Nashville, Tenn.); Sunday down south (Radio program); Ryman Auditorium (Nashville, Tenn.); Cobb, David (Announcer); Hall, Buddy (Singer); Traubel, Helen; Watson, Dolores; Anita Kerr Singers; Bradley, Owen; Lion Orchestra (Musical group)
